en.title: Photos FE Event Jakarta, Indonesia, 12th July 2008(1).
en.content:
FE Indonesia's 1st Achievers Recognition Dinner on 12th July 2008 at the HailalInternational Executive Club was a GREAT SUCCESS attended by 700 Members, Leaders, VIPs and invited guests! Many of FE's top leaders, including Presidential Directors were there to spearhead their network in Indonesia. 

The potential for FE's Quantum Pendant in Indonesia is HUGE, with a population base of over 250 million and a large and growing middle class.

With FE's unblemished TRACK RECORD combined with our excellent BRANDING and our dedicated leaders, FE is set to make waves in the Indonesian market!

Highlights of the Event include:

- Entertaiment provided by Hailal dance troupe and singers.

- Speeches by Paul Ting ( CEO and Founder), KS Lee ( Marketing Director and Founder).

- Speech by Country Licensee, Patrick Widjaja.

- Speech by Irene Mongkar, FE Leader and Coodinator of Event. Thank you, Irene for a wonderful    job!

- Presentation on Quantum Pendant by FE's Medical Consultant and Author, Dr Siva M.D.

- Speech by Dr Edwards, FE's School of Networking Trainer Extraordinaire.

- Testimonial by FE's Spokesman and former World Champion Badminton Player, Foo Kok Keong

- Testimonial and Demos by FE's Spokesman and International Golf Long Drive Specialist, Jean    Daniels.

- "Lifting" Demonstration " conducted by KC Phoon.

- Testimonials by Paul and Doris Lee, former owners of the Royal London Circus.

- Recognition of Indonesian Directors.

- Closing Speeches by Presidential Directors Rachel Thomas and KC Phoon.

- Lucky Draws.

Last and not least, FE would like to thank our dynamite Leader, Anowar JM for being the MC for the night. A big Thank You also to Mr and Mrs Patrick Widjaja, Mr and Mrs Praba Ramadass and Rachel Thomas for working tirelessly to make FE's first event in Indonesia a great SUCCESS!

And to all the Presidential Directors and Leaders from Malaysia who attended, THANK YOU AND SEE YOU AT THE TOP!
